english.segment1: When there's no heart. Yeah, I wanna live again. Can't delay it no, no more. No youve got no heart
english.segment2: I try to sleep but I think a lot. I'm driving streets that just never stop. When you know there's gonna be. When you know there's gonna be no more shows
english.segment3: When there's no goals. Yeah, I wanna live again. Can't delay it no, no more. No you've got no soul
